headline: Chipotle Stock Sees First Insider Buy Since CEO Change
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill  stock has been sliding in 2025, and one director just made the first insider buy of shares since the restaurant chain named a new CEO.  In August,  Starbucks  recruited Brian Niccol, the CEO of  Chipotle Mexican Grill  at the time, as its new head.  Chipotle named Chief Operating Officer Scott Boatwright as its interim CEO and made his appointment permanent in November.

Chipotle named Chief Operating Officer Scott Boatwright as its interim CEO and made his appointment permanent in November.

headline: Chipotle Stock Hits Lowest Level in More Than a Year. Months. Time to Buy?
summary: Chipotle stock has tumbled 17% this year and sank to its lowest level in more than a year on Monday.  Sweetgreen, Cava, and Shake Shack, for example, all have bigger year-to-date losses—24%, 30%, and 34%, respectively.  Within the group, Chipotle is the largest and the best-positioned for a bounceback.

headline: Chipotle Won't Raise Prices as Tariffs Take Effect
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill CEO Scott Boatwright talks about how tariffs are impacting the restaurant chain, he says they are now buying avocados from more countries and they're not raising prices...
